errors.clientAlreadyExists: OAuth client with this ID already exists
errors.codeAlreadyUsed: Authorization code has already been used
errors.clientMismatch: Client ID does not match the authorization code
errors.redirectUriMismatch: Redirect URI does not match the authorization code
errors.codeVerifierRequired: Code verifier is required for PKCE

errors.userNotFoundToSignUp: No account found for the provided email. Please register first
errors.phoneNotFoundToSignUp: No account found for the provided phone number. Please register first
errors.emailAlreadyExists: The email is already registered. Please log in directly
errors.phoneAlreadyExists: The phone number is already registered. Please log in directly
errors.unbindingNotAllowed: At least one email or binding exists
errors.invalidProviderData: This {provider} account is already bound to another user
errors.unableToGenerateUsername: Unable to generate a valid username
errors.usernameLength: Username must be between 2 and 32 characters
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please request a new code.
errors.tooManyOtpRequests: Too many OTP requests. Please try again in {minutes} minutes.
errors.userAlreadyMember: This email is already bound to a namespace member
errors.usersAlreadyMember: {emails} is already bound to namespace members
errors.userNotLoggedInMiniProgram: User has not logged in via MiniProgram
